Scorers¶

In this extension, we have 2 main scorers.

  1. Binned scorer

  2. NTUple scorer

You can also add Digitizers to the scorers to process detected signals.

Binned scorer¶

The binned scorer accumuates detected signal in divided volume. You can easily obtain projection data You need to set the number of bins and size of bins to divide

NTUple scorer¶

Ring-shaped detector is another type of detector commonly used for PET or SPECT system.

Digitizers¶

We have implemnted the following digitizers:

  • Time resolution

  • Dead time

  • Energy threshold

  • Energy uphold
